extendedInfo.description: USA TODAY named Calculator Plus among its "25 Essential Apps", calling it the "handy calculator app that's garnered great user ratings"I'm Calculator Plus - the perfect calculator for Android.  I'm easy to use and beautifully designed to do things better than your phone or handheld calculator ever did.I'm big, easy to read, and I love saving you time and effort.  I remember everything you calculate, and let you review it anytime, making me perfect for shopping, doing homework, balancing checkbooks, or even helping with taxes.  And if you need to quit and go do something else, I'll have it all waiting for you when you come back.  You'll never need to type the same calculation twice again.I'm attractive and effective and I make great use of your big, beautiful display:- I show your calculations in clear, elegant type that's easy to read, with commas just where they should be- You'll never lose track of where you are in a calculation - I show you exactly what's happening at all times- I remember everything, so you can take a break, then come back later and pick up where you left off- You can use backspace anytime to correct a simple mistake, instead of starting over- Use memory to keep a running total you can actually see- Swipe memory keys aside if you need more advanced math functions- My percentage key shows exactly what it did, so you're not left confused- My intuitive, lovable design makes it simple to do everyday calculations on your phone or tabletLet Calculator Plus on your phone or tablet finally put that handheld calculator to rest.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Simply awesome! The best calculator on the market,easy to use easy to read
reviews.author: Tony Hollingsworth

reviews.title: Its a 7 star calculator
reviews.comment: Tried. Many many calcys. BUT THIS IS ONE IS WORLD BEST .ITS NOT 5STAR BUT 7STAR. GREAT.. VASHI
reviews.author: VASHI MELWANI

reviews.title: Wonderful..
reviews.comment: Great app.. Very good layout.. Easy interface.. I love it..
reviews.author: Praveen Madhusudhan

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Simple, uncomplicated and easy to use. Excellent app. Work great in my Note II.
reviews.author: Miguel Estevez

reviews.title: Real looking calculator
reviews.comment: Calculator with decent shaded buttons. This reminds me of calculators my grandparent\'s used in the 80\'s. Most calculators for Android just look to plain, blocky or clinical to me. I liked the Samsung calculator but am now on CM 10.2. This looks good on the large screen of my Note 2.
reviews.author: Michael Thompson

reviews.title: App is appsolutely wonderful!
reviews.comment: SGS4 *Easy to use *Crisp, clear *View of numbers - good size *Excited how it calcs tip simply *Using paid version (no ads) *Creates history and can be cleared *Running adding machine style *Wow, would I download again?  YES! In a heart beat...
reviews.author: Movie Q

reviews.title: It adds up
reviews.comment: And subtracts too! Looks much better than the built in calculator app on my HTC one
reviews.author: Allistair Brown

reviews.title: Won\'t be without it
reviews.comment: Love this calculator esp the tallying of nbrs. Dont need any others. Well done Dev.
reviews.author: An Sapphire Gael

reviews.title: Well designed
reviews.comment: Good replacement for the butt-ugly default Android calculator. Scales well on tablets though it is portrait-only. Seems odd that AC doesn\'t clear the memory, and I\'d like to see \"What\'s New\" here in the store.
reviews.author: Peter Donnelly

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this calculator.  Just what I was looking for.  I would recommend this app for anyone looking for a good calculator.  I liked it so much I upgraded to the paid version.  This is a great app,  for anyone looking for a calculator capable of many functions.
reviews.author: Connie Berdych

reviews.title: Excellent app like it states.
reviews.comment: Well there are many calculator makes but I think yours is rated at the top.
reviews.author: Ronnie Brown

reviews.title: Best \'Simple\' Calc on market!
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t claim to be a \'scientific\' calulator, the few reviews that criticise it miss the point.  What it is (I\'ve tried many) is THE best simple calc out there.  Fabulous elegant design, but more important for me was superbly simple M+, M-, MR, MC (dual memory).  Other calcs with dual memory too complex.  Indeed, I have just bought their \'Fraction Calc Plus\' (no ads) even tho I rarely use fractions, just because the design is brilliant and they deserve the support!  (Galaxy Note)
reviews.author: Graham Gardner

reviews.title: Calculator that works
reviews.comment: The problem has bug me for years. Most of the calculator developers think you need a scientific calculator. They took your input and start rearranging them starting with \303\267\303\227+-. What were they thinking? !!! Secondly, after you perform your calculation and wish to multiply the result with itself, they can\'t and show wrong result.  This have have none of that and fully deserved 5 stars. The first and only calculator that so deserving that I paid for it.
reviews.author: Andre Kua

reviews.comment: I am pleasantly surprised with calculator plus, I was searching for an app to replace the calculator that came on my HTC one x which didn\'t even have a percent key  and found this simple to use, do all calculator,\tTry it you\'ll be impressed
reviews.author: justin moore

reviews.title: Note 2
reviews.comment: Easy and convenient to use. If included a \"backspace\" button will be even perfect.
reviews.author: Benny Wah

reviews.title: Perfect calculator
reviews.comment: Supports both simple and scientific modes and supports multiwindow. Not a graphing calculator by any means, but extremely handy for general arithmetic.
reviews.author: Mike Teehan

reviews.title: Best calculator app
reviews.comment: I really like this app it\'s the best calculator I have found for the Samsung g3
reviews.author: Rover River
